page.title: 19TRANSPORT.
page.content: Since the public transport service in our block is extremely limited,many local people rely heavily on{THE ST. {KEW TAXI SERVICE.}This service operates from St. Kew Highway and is a small family business. It has 4 cars and 3 drivers who work about 12 hours a day. Three cars are 4 years old and one is new. The new car does about 5 journeys every day and averages about 100 miles using 4 litres of petrol. The taxis are only used for short journeys at a cost of 25p per mile with reduced rates for children. The taxis carry a lot of old people without their own transport and are used for weddings and funerals. The taxis are serviced every month. {THE {LOCAL BUS SERVICE}provides transport once a day to several nearby villages and towns. Some extra services are provided during school holidays.
